data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Osh, Kyrgyzstan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Osh, Kyrgyzstan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Osh, Kyrgyzstan.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.section_summary: On average, 17 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Osh, Kyrgyzstan.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Osh, Kyrgyzstan a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Osh access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Lyuli people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Osh. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 777 believers in Osh against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.section_summary:
the state of Osh, Kyrgyzstan has a population of 256,800.

We estimate Osh has 777 people who might know Jesus, 8,745 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 247,278 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 330 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Osh, Kyrgyzstan the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.
